title: Tsugu Tsugumomo
synopsis: When "ordinary boy" Kagami Kazuya meets the beautiful tsukumogami Kiriha, his life gets turned upside-down. As a "Taboo Child" who draws the supernatural towards him, he receives orders from the God of the Land, Kukuri, to become an exorcist and defeat these evil forces. And so, he and Kiriha do battle.
characters: ['Kiriha', 'Kagami, Kazuya ', 'Kukuri', 'Kokuyou', 'Sumeragi, Sunao', 'Osanai, Osamu', 'Chikaishi, Chisato', 'Kagami, Kanaka', 'Kagami, Kasumi', 'Tadata, Tadataka']
staff: [['Kuramoto, Masaya', ['Producer']], ['Kuraya, Ryouichi', ['Director', ' Series Composition']], ['Gou, Fumiyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Iwanaga, Daiji', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
